atk-s0303a:229_3: idāni saha vipassanāya tayo magge dassetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ. Ettakena vā ṭhānena tīṇi
atk-s0303a:229_4: maggāni kathitāni, idāni saha vipassanāya arahattamaggaṃ dassetumpi idaṃ āraddhameva.
atk-s0303a:230: Sapajāpatikāti saddhiṃ pajāpatinā devarājena. Ārakāva namassantīti dūratova namassanti, dūrepi ṭhitaṃ namassantiyeva āyasmantaṃ nītattheraṃ viya.
atk-s0303a:231_0: Thero kira pupphacchaḍḍakakulato nikkhamma pabbajito, khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0303a:231_1: cintesi – “ahaṃ ajjeva pabbajito ajjeva me pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0303a:231_2: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūressāmī”ti. So paṃsukūlatthāya sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā coḷakaṃ
atk-s0303a:231_3: pariyesanto vicari. Atheko mahābrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya manussapathaṃ olokento
atk-s0303a:231_4: theraṃ disvā – “ajjeva pabbajitvā ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0303a:231_5: pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tamañño mahābrahmā
atk-s0303a:231_6: disvā “kaṃ namassasī”ti? Pucchi. Nītattheraṃ namassāmīti. Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Ajjeva pabbajitvā
atk-s0303a:231_7: ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatīti.
atk-s0303a:231_8: Sopi naṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Athañño, athaññoti sattasatā mahābrahmāno namassamānā
atk-s0303a:243: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattassa kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:245_0: 80. Aṭṭhame kismiñcideva pakaraṇeti kismiñcideva kāraṇe. Paṇāmetvāti nīharitvā. Kismiṃ
atk-s0303a:245_1: pana kāraṇe ete bhagavatā paṇāmitāti? Ekasmiñhi antovasse bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0303a:245_2: vutthavasso pavāretvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthito nikkhamitvā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0303a:245_3: caranto kapilavatthuṃ patvā nigrodhārāmaṃ pāvisi. Sakyarājāno “satthā āgato”ti sutvā
atk-s0303a:245_4: pacchābhatte kappiyāni telamadhuphāṇitādīni ceva pānakāni ca kājasatehi gāhāpetvā
atk-s0303a:245_5: vihāraṃ gantvā saṅghassa niyyātetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā ekamante
atk-s0303a:245_6: nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathento nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekacce
atk-s0303a:245_7: bhikkhū senāsanaṃ paṭijagganti, ekacce mañcapīṭhādīni paññāpenti, sāmaṇerā appaharitaṃ
atk-s0303a:245_8: karonti. Bhājanīyaṭṭhāne sampattabhikkhūpi atthi, asampattabhikkhūpi atthi. Sampattā
atk-s0303a:245_9: asampattānaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhantā, “amhākaṃ detha, amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha upajjhāyassa
atk-s0303a:245_10: dethā”ti kathentā mahāsaddamakaṃsu. Satthā sutvā theraṃ pucchi “ke pana te, ānanda,
atk-s0303a:245_11: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti? Thero etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā
atk-s0303a:245_12: sutvā “āmisahetu, ānanda, bhikkhū mahāsaddaṃ karontī”ti āha. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Ananucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0303a:245_13: ānanda, appatirūpaṃ. Na hi mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni cīvarādihetu
atk-s0303a:245_14: pāramiyo pūritā, nāpi ime bhikkhū cīvarādihetu agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, arahattahetu
atk-s0303a:245_15: pabbajitvā anatthaṃ atthasadisaṃ asāraṃ sārasadisaṃ karonti, gacchānanda, te bhikkhū paṇāmehī”ti.
atk-s0303a:246_0: Pubbaṇhasamayanti dutiyadivase pubbaṇhasamayaṃ. Beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūleti taruṇabeluvarukkhamūle.
atk-s0303a:246_1: Pabāḷhoti pabāhito. Pavāḷhotipi pāṭho, pavāhitoti attho. Ubhayampi nīhaṭabhāvameva
atk-s0303a:246_2: dīpeti. Siyā aññathattanti pasādaññathattaṃ vā bhāvaññathattaṃ vā bhaveyya. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0303a:246_3: “Sammāsambuddhena mayaṃ lahuke kāraṇe paṇāmitā”ti pasādaṃ mandaṃ karontānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ
atk-s0303a:246_4: nāma hoti. Saliṅgeneva titthāyatanaṃ pakkamantānaṃ bhāvaññathattaṃ nāma. Siyā vipariṇāmoti
atk-s0303a:246_5: ettha pana “mayaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmāti pabbajitā, naṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0303a:246_6: asakkontānaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti? Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ vipariṇāmoti
atk-s0303a:246_7: veditabbo. Vacchassāti khīrūpakavacchassa. Aññathattanti milāyanaaññathattaṃ. Khīrūpako
atk-s0303a:246_8: hi vaccho mātu adassanena khīraṃ alabhanto milāyati kampati pavedhati. Vipariṇāmoti
atk-s0303a:246_9: maraṇaṃ. So hi khīraṃ alabhamāno khīrapipāsāya sussanto patitvā marati.
atk-s0303a:247_0: Bījānaṃ taruṇānanti udakena anuggahetabbānaṃ virūḷhabījānaṃ. Aññathattanti milāyanaññathattameva.
atk-s0303a:247_1: Tāni hi udakaṃ alabhantāni milāyanti. Vipariṇāmoti vināso. Tāni hi udakaṃ alabhantāni
atk-s0303a:247_2: sukkhitvā vinassanti, palālameva honti. Anuggahitoti āmisānuggahena ceva dhammānuggahena
atk-s0303a:247_3: ca anuggahito. Anuggaṇheyyanti dvīhipi etehi anuggahehi anuggaṇheyyaṃ. Acirapabbajitā
atk-s0303a:247_4: hi sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca cīvarādipaccayavekalle vā sati gelaññe vā satthārā
atk-s0303a:247_5: vā ācariyupajjhāyehi vā āmisānuggahena ananuggahitā kilamantā na sakkonti sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0303a:247_6: vā manasikāraṃ vā kātuṃ, dhammānuggahena ananuggahitā uddesena ceva ovādānusāsaniyā
atk-s0303a:247_7: ca parihāyamānā na sakkonti akusalaṃ parivajjetvā kusalaṃ bhāvetuṃ. Imehi pana dvīhi
atk-s0303a:247_8: anuggahehi anuggahitā kāyena akilamantā sajjhāyamanasikāre pavattitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0303a:247_9: paṭipajjamānā aparabhāge taṃ anuggahaṃ alabhantāpi teneva purimānuggahena laddhabalā
atk-s0303a:247_10: sāsane patiṭṭhahanti, tasmā bhagavato evaṃ parivitakko udapādi.
atk-s0303a:248_0: Bhagavato purato pāturahosīti satthu cittaṃ ñatvā – “ime bhikkhū bhagavatā paṇāmitā,
atk-s0303a:248_1: idāni nesaṃ anuggahaṃ kātukāmo evaṃ cintesi, kāraṇaṃ bhagavā cintesi, ahamettha ussāhaṃ
atk-s0303a:248_2: janessāmī”ti purato pākaṭo ahosi. Santettha bhikkhūti idaṃ so mahābrahmā yathā nāma
atk-s0303a:248_3: byatto sūdo yadeva ambilaggādīsu rasajātaṃ rañño ruccati, taṃ abhisaṅkhārena sādutaraṃ
atk-s0303a:248_4: katvā punadivase upanāmeti, evameva attano byattatāya bhagavatā āhaṭaupamaṃyeva evametaṃ
atk-s0303a:248_5: bhagavātiādivacanehi abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ yācanto bhikkhusaṅghassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0303a:248_6: vadati. Tattha abhinandatūti “mama santikaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti. Evamassa
atk-s0303a:248_7: āgamanaṃ sampiyāyamāno abhinandatu. Abhivadatūti āgatassa ca ovādānusāsaniṃ dadanto abhivadatu.
atk-s0303a:249_0: Paṭisallānāti ekībhāvā. Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsīti iddhiṃ akāsi. Ekadvīhikāyāti
atk-s0303a:249_1: ekeko ceva dve dve ca hutvā. Sārajjamānarūpāti ottappamānasabhāvā bhāyamānā. Kasmā
atk-s0303a:249_2: pana bhagavā tesaṃ tathā upasaṅkamanāya iddhimakāsīti? Hitapatthanāya. Yadi hi te
atk-s0303a:249_3: vaggavaggā hutvā āgaccheyyuṃ, “bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho
atk-s0303a:249_4: ekadivasampi tattha vasituṃ nāsakkhi, vegeneva āgato”ti keḷimpi kareyyuṃ. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0303a:249_5: neva buddhagāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhaheyya, na dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ samatthā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0303a:249_6: Sabhayānaṃ pana sasārajjānaṃ ekadvīhikāya āgacchantānaṃ buddhagāravañceva paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0303a:249_7: bhavissati, dhammadesanañca sampaṭicchituṃ sakkhissantīti cintetvā tesaṃ hitapatthanāya
atk-s0303a:250_0: Nisīdiṃsūti tesu hi sārajjamānarūpesu āgacchantesu eko bhikkhu “mamaṃyeva satthā
atk-s0303a:250_1: oloketi, maṃyeva maññe niggaṇhitukāmo”ti saṇikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisīdi, athañño
atk-s0303a:250_2: athaññoti evaṃ pañcabhikkhusatāni nisīdiṃsu. Evaṃ nisinnaṃ pana bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sīdantare
atk-s0303a:250_3: sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ viya nivāte padīpaṃ viya ca niccalaṃ disvā satthā cintesi
atk-s0303a:250_4: – “imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīdisī dhammadesanā vaṭṭatī”ti? Athassa etadahosi – “ime āhārahetu
atk-s0303a:250_5: paṇāmitā, piṇḍiyālopadhammadesanāva nesaṃ sappāyā, taṃ dassetvā matthake tiparivaṭṭadesanaṃ
atk-s0303a:250_6: desessāmi, desanāpariyosāne sabbe arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti. Atha nesaṃ taṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0303a:251_0: Tattha antanti pacchimaṃ lāmakaṃ. Yadidaṃ piṇḍolyanti yaṃ evaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena
atk-s0303a:251_1: jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha padattho – piṇḍāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, piṇḍolassa
atk-s0303a:251_2: kammaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ, piṇḍapariyesanena nipphāditajīvitanti attho. Abhisāpoti akkoso.
atk-s0303a:251_3: Kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ “cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā kapālaṃ gahetvā piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno
atk-s0303a:251_4: carissatī”ti akkosanti. Atha vā pana “kiṃ tuyhaṃ akātabbaṃ atthi, yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavā
atk-s0303a:251_5: vīriyasampannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo viya piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī”ti? Evampi
atk-s0303a:251_6: akkosantiyeva. Tañca kho etanti evaṃ taṃ abhisāpaṃ samānampi piṇḍolyaṃ. Kulaputtā
atk-s0303a:251_7: upenti atthavasikāti mama sāsane jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca atthavasikā kāraṇavasikā
atk-s0303a:252_0: Rājābhinītātiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā
atk-s0303a:252_1: pabbajanti, te rājābhinītā nāma. Te hi raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā rājābhinītā nāma.
atk-s0303a:252_2: Ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ekacce “mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi
atk-s0303a:252_3: vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā pabbajissāma, tattha yaṃ yaṃ buddhapūjādipuññaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0303a:252_4: tato tumhākaṃ pattiṃ dassāmā”ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti, te corābhinītā nāma. Tepi
atk-s0303a:252_5: hi corehi māretabbataṃ abhinītāti corābhinītā nāma. Ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ
atk-s0303a:252_6: asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te iṇaṭṭā nāma, iṇapīḷitāti attho. Iṇaṭṭhātipi pāṭho,
atk-s0303a:252_7: iṇe ṭhitāti attho. Ye rājacorachātakarogabhayānaṃ aññatarena abhibhūtā upaddutā pabbajanti,
atk-s0303a:252_8: te bhayaṭṭā nāma, bhayapīḷitāti attho. Bhayaṭṭhātipi pāṭho, bhaye ṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0303a:252_9: Ājīvikāpakatāti ājīvikāya upaddutā abhibhūtā, puttadāraṃ posetuṃ asakkontāti attho.
atk-s0303a:253_0: So ca hoti abhijjhālūti idaṃ so kulaputto “dukkhassa antaṃ karissāmī”tiādivasena
atk-s0303a:253_1: cittaṃ uppādetvā pabbajito, aparabhāge, taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0303a:253_2: taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijjhālūti parabhaṇḍānaṃ abhijjhāyitā. Tibbasārāgoti
atk-s0303a:253_3: bahalarāgo. Byāpannacittoti pūtibhāvena vipannacitto. Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappoti tikhiṇasiṅgo
atk-s0303a:253_4: viya goṇo duṭṭhacitto. Muṭṭhassatīti bhattanikkhittakāko viya naṭṭhassati, idha kataṃ
atk-s0303a:253_5: ettha nassati. Asampajānoti nippañño. Khandhādiparicchedarahito. Asamāhitoti caṇḍasote
atk-s0303a:253_6: baddhanāvā viya upacārappanābhāvena asaṇṭhito. Vibbhantacittoti bandhāruḷhamago viya
atk-s0303a:253_7: santamano. Pākatindriyoti yathā gihī puttadhītaro olokento asaṃvutindriyo hoti, evaṃ asaṃvutindriyo.
atk-s0303a:254_0: Chavālātanti chavānaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhāne alātaṃ. Ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagatanti pamāṇena
atk-s0303a:254_1: aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ. Neva gāmeti sace hi
atk-s0303a:254_2: taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa, gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ
atk-s0303a:254_3: phareyya. Sace khettakuṭiyaṃ kaṭṭhattharamañcakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā, araññe
atk-s0303a:254_4: kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. Yasmā pana ubhayathāpi na sakkā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Gihibhogā
atk-s0303a:254_5: ca parihīnoti yo agāre vasantehi gihīhi dāyajje bhājiyamāne bhogo laddhabbo assa,
atk-s0303a:254_6: tato ca parihīno. Sāmaññatthañcāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena
atk-s0303a:254_7: pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca. Imañca pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena āhari, parisuddhasīlassa
atk-s0303a:254_8: pana alasassa abhijjhādīhi dosehi upahatassa puggalassa imaṃ upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0303a:255_0: Tayome, bhikkhaveti kasmā āraddhaṃ? Imassa puggalassa chavālātasadisabhāvo neva mātāpitūhi
atk-s0303a:255_1: kato, na ācariyupajjhāyehi, imehi pana pāpavitakkehi katoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0303a:255_2: Animittaṃ vā samādhinti vipassanāsamādhiṃ. So hi niccanimittādīnaṃ samugghātanena
atk-s0303a:255_3: animittoti vuccati. Ettha ca cattāro satipaṭṭhānā missakā, animittasamādhi pubbabhāgo.
atk-s0303a:255_4: Animittasamādhi vā missako, satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgāti veditabbā.
atk-s0303a:256_0: Dvemā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyoti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ animittasamādhibhāvanā imesaṃyeva
atk-s0303a:256_1: tiṇṇaṃ mahāvitakkānaṃ pahānāya saṃvattati, sassatucchedadiṭṭhīnampi pana samugghātaṃ
atk-s0303a:256_2: karotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na vajjavā assanti niddoso bhaveyyaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0303a:256_3: Iti bhagavā imasmimpi sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0303a:256_4: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:258_0: 81. Navame cārikaṃ pakkāmīti kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahakāle satthā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0303a:258_1: dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ āharitvā “na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācana”ntiādīhi
atk-s0303a:258_2: gāthāhi ovadati. Taṃdivasaṃ tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. Dutiyadivasepi
atk-s0303a:258_3: bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi. Taṃdivasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā.
atk-s0303a:258_4: Tatiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi. Atha naṃ aññataro bhikkhu evamāha
atk-s0303a:258_5: – “appossukko, bhante, bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharatu, mayametena
atk-s0303a:258_6: bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti. Satthā “pariyādiṇṇarūpacittā
atk-s0303a:258_7: kho ime moghapurisā, na ime sakkā saññāpetu”nti cintetvā – “kiṃ mayhaṃ imehi, ekacāravāsaṃ
atk-s0303a:258_8: vasissāmī”ti? So pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kañcipi
atk-s0303a:259_0: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samayeti idaṃ thero yasmāssa ajja bhagavā ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ
atk-s0303a:259_1: pakkamissati, ajja dvīhi, ajja satena, ajja sahassena, ajja ekakovāti sabbo bhagavato
atk-s0303a:259_2: cāro vidito pākaṭo paccakkho, tasmā āha.
atk-s0303a:260_0: Anupubbenāti gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caramāno ekacāravāsaṃ tāva vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0303a:260_1: passitukāmo hutvā bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ agamāsi. Tattha bhaguttherassa sakalapacchābhattañceva
atk-s0303a:260_2: tiyāmarattiñca ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā punadivase tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya
atk-s0303a:260_3: caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā “samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte passissāmī”ti
atk-s0303a:260_4: pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ agamāsi. Tesampi sakalapacchābhattañceva tiyāmarattiñca ekacāravāse
atk-s0303a:260_5: ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā te tattheva nivattetvā ekakova pālileyya nagarābhimukho pakkamitvā
atk-s0303a:260_6: anupubbena pālileyyanagaraṃ sampatto. Tena vuttaṃ – “anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0303a:261_0: Bhaddasālamūleti pālileyyavāsino bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyato avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo
atk-s0303a:261_1: nāma atthi, tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0303a:261_2: vāsayiṃsu. Bhaddasālo pana tattheko manāpo laddhako sālarukkho. Bhagavā taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0303a:261_3: upanissāya tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle viharati. Tena vuttaṃ “bhaddasālamūle”ti.
atk-s0303a:262_0: Evaṃ viharante panettha tathāgate aññataro hatthināgo hatthinīhi hatthipotakādīhi
atk-s0303a:262_1: gocarabhūmititthogāhanādīsu ubbāḷho yūthe ukkaṇṭhito “kiṃ me imehi hatthīhī”ti? Yūthaṃ
atk-s0303a:262_2: pahāya manussapathaṃ gacchanto pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena
atk-s0303a:262_3: nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi. So tato paṭṭhāya satthu
atk-s0303a:262_4: vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto mukhadhovanaṃ deti, nhānodakaṃ āharati, dantakaṭṭhaṃ deti,
atk-s0303a:262_5: pariveṇaṃ sammajjati, araññato madhurāni phalāphalāni āharitvā satthuno deti. Satthā paribhogaṃ karoti.
atk-s0303a:263_0: Ekadivasaṃ satthā rattibhāgasamanantare caṅkamitvā pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi. Hatthīpi
atk-s0303a:263_1: avidūre ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Satthā pacchato oloketvā na kiñci addasa, evaṃ purato ca ubhayapassesu
atk-s0303a:263_2: ca. Athassa “sukhaṃ vatāhaṃ aññatra tehi bhaṇḍanakārakehi vasāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0303a:263_3: Hatthinopi “mayā nāmitasākhaṃ aññe khādantā natthī”tiādīni cintetvā – “sukhaṃ vata
atk-s0303a:263_4: ekakova vasāmi, satthu vattaṃ kātuṃ labhāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji. Satthā attano cittaṃ
atk-s0303a:263_5: oloketvā – “mama tāva īdisaṃ cittaṃ, kīdisaṃ nu kho hatthissā”ti tassāpi tādisameva
atk-s0303a:263_6: disvā “sameti no citta”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0303a:265: Sameti cittaṃ cittena, yadeko ramatī vane”ti. ;
atk-s0303a:266_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhūti atha evaṃ tathāgate tattha viharante pañcasatā disāsu
atk-s0303a:266_1: vassaṃvutthā bhikkhū. Yenāyasmā ānandoti “satthā kira bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā araññaṃ
atk-s0303a:266_2: paviṭṭho”ti attano dhammatāya satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ asakkontā yenāyasmā ānando, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0303a:267_0: Anantarā āsavānaṃ khayoti maggānantaraṃ arahattaphalaṃ. Vicayasoti vicayena, tesaṃ
atk-s0303a:267_1: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavicinanasamatthena ñāṇena paricchinditvāti attho. Dhammoti
atk-s0303a:267_2: sāsanadhammo. Cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādi ye ye koṭṭhāse paricchinditvā dhammo desito,
atk-s0303a:267_3: tesaṃ pakāsanatthāya vuttaṃ. Samanupassanāti diṭṭhisamanupassanā. Saṅkhāro soti diṭṭhisaṅkhāro
atk-s0303a:267_4: so. Tatojo so saṅkhāroti tato taṇhāto so saṅkhāro jāto. Taṇhāsampayuttesu cittesupi
atk-s0303a:267_5: catūsu cittesu esa jāyati. Sāpi taṇhāti sā diṭṭhisaṅkhārassa paccayabhūtā taṇhā.
atk-s0303a:267_6: Sāpi vedanāti sā taṇhāya paccayabhūtā vedanā. Sopi phassoti so vedanāya paccayo avijjāsamphasso.
atk-s0303a:268_0: No cassaṃ, no ca me siyāti sace ahaṃ na bhaveyyaṃ, mama parikkhāropi na bhaveyya.
atk-s0303a:268_1: Nābhavissaṃ, na me bhavissatīti sace pana āyatimpi ahaṃ na bhavissāmi, evaṃ mama
atk-s0303a:268_2: parikkhāropi na bhavissati. Ettake ṭhāne bhagavā tena bhikkhunā gahitagahitadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0303a:268_3: vissajjāpento āgato puggalajjhāsayenapi desanāvilāsenapi. Tatojo so saṅkhāroti taṇhāsampayuttacitte
atk-s0303a:268_4: vicikicchāva natthi, kathaṃ vicikicchāsaṅkhāro taṇhāto jāyatīti? Appahīnattā. Yassa
atk-s0303a:268_5: hi taṇhāya appahīnāya so uppajjati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhiyāpi eseva nayo
atk-s0303a:268_6: labbhatiyeva catūsu hi cittuppādesu sampayuttadiṭṭhi nāma natthi. Yasmā pana taṇhāya
atk-s0303a:268_7: appahīnattā sā uppajjati, tasmā taṃ sandhāya tatrāpi ayamattho yujjati. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-s0303a:268_8: sutte tevīsatiyā ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:270_0: 82. Dasame tadahuposathetiādi pavāraṇasutte vitthāritameva. Kiñcideva desanti kiñci
atk-s0303a:270_1: kāraṇaṃ. Sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasīti kasmā evamāha? So kira bhikkhu
atk-s0303a:270_2: pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro. Ācariye pana ṭhitake pucchante sace te bhikkhū nisīdanti,
atk-s0303a:270_3: satthari gāravaṃ kataṃ hoti, ācariye agāravaṃ. Sace uṭṭhahanti, ācariye gāravaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0303a:270_4: hoti, satthari agāravaṃ. Iti nesaṃ cittaṃ anekaggaṃ bhavissati, desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ
atk-s0303a:270_5: na sakkhissanti. Tasmiṃ pana nisīditvā pucchante tesaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0303a:270_6: desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ sakkhissantīti ñatvā bhagavā evamāha. Ime nu kho, bhanteti
atk-s0303a:270_7: ayaṃ thero pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ācariyo, pañcakkhandhamattampi nappajānātīti
atk-s0303a:270_8: na vattabbo. Pañhaṃ pucchantena pana “ime pañcupādānakkhandhā, na aññe”ti evaṃ jānantena
atk-s0303a:270_9: viya hutvā pucchituṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā ajānanto viya pucchati. Tepi cassa antevāsikā
atk-s0303a:270_10: “amhākaṃ ācariyo ‘ahaṃ jānāmī’ti na katheti, sabbaññutaññāṇena pana saddhiṃ saṃsanditvāva
atk-s0303a:270_11: kathetī”ti sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissantītipi ajānanto viya pucchati.
atk-s0303a:271_0: Chandamūlakāti taṇhāchandamūlakā. Na kho bhikkhu taññeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhāti
atk-s0303a:271_1: yasmā chandarāgamattaṃ pañcakkhandhā na hoti, tasmā idaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana sahajātato
atk-s0303a:271_2: vā ārammaṇato vā khandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi, tasmā nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi
atk-s0303a:271_3: upādānanti vuttaṃ. Taṇhāsampayuttasmiñhi citte vattamāne taṃcittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
atk-s0303a:271_4: rūpakkhandho, ṭhapetvā taṃ taṇhaṃ sesā arūpadhammā cattāro khandhāti sahajātatopi
atk-s0303a:271_5: khandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi. Upādānassa pana rūpādīsu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0303a:271_6: uppajjanato ārammaṇatopi pañcakkhandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi. Chandarāgavemattatāti
atk-s0303a:271_7: chandarāganānattaṃ. Evaṃ kho bhikkhūti evaṃ rūpārammaṇassa chandarāgassa vedanādīsu
atk-s0303a:271_8: aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ akaraṇato siyā chandarāgavemattatā. Khandhādhivacananti khandhāti
atk-s0303a:271_9: ayaṃ paññatti. Ayaṃ pana anusandhi na ghaṭiyati, kiñcāpi na ghaṭiyati, sānusandhikāva
atk-s0303a:271_10: pucchā, sānusandhikaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Ayañhi thero tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayena
atk-s0303a:271_11: pucchati, satthāpi tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayeneva vissajjeti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:272: Imassa ca pana vaggassa ekekasmiṃ sutte pañcasatā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0303a:276_0: 83. Theravaggassa paṭhame mantāṇiputtoti, mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto. Upādāyāti
atk-s0303a:276_1: āgamma ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca. Asmīti hotīti asmīti evaṃ pavattaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcattayaṃ
atk-s0303a:276_2: hoti. Daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbanena samannāgato. Maṇḍanakajātikoti maṇḍanakasabhāvo
atk-s0303a:276_3: maṇḍanakasīlo. Mukhanimittanti mukhapaṭibimbaṃ. Tañhi parisuddhaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0303a:276_4: paññāyati. Kiṃ pana taṃ olokayato sakamukhaṃ paññāyati, paramukhanti? Yadi sakaṃ
atk-s0303a:276_5: bhaveyya, parammukhaṃ hutvā paññāyeyya, atha parassa bhaveyya, vaṇṇādīhi asadisaṃ
atk-s0303a:276_6: hutvā paññāyeyya. Tasmā na taṃ attano, na parassa, ādāsaṃ pana nissāya nibhāsarūpaṃ
atk-s0303a:276_7: nāma taṃ paññāyatīti vadanti. Atha yaṃ udake paññāyati, taṃ kena kāraṇenāti? Mahābhūtānaṃ
atk-s0303a:276_8: visuddhatāya. Dhammo me abhisamitoti mayā ñāṇena catusaccadhammo abhisamāgato, sotāpannosmi
atk-s0303a:278_0: 84. Dutiye madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo viya akammañño. Disāpi meti ayaṃ
atk-s0303a:278_1: puratthimā ayaṃ dakkhiṇāti evaṃ disāpi mayhaṃ na pakkhāyanti, na pākaṭā hontīti vadati.
atk-s0303a:278_2: Dhammāpi maṃ na paṭibhantīti pariyattidhammāpi mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahanti, uggahitaṃ
atk-s0303a:278_3: sajjhāyitaṃ na dissatīti vadati. Vicikicchāti no mahāvicikicchā. Na hi tassa “sāsanaṃ
atk-s0303a:278_4: niyyānikaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”ti vimati uppajjati. Evaṃ panassa hoti “sakkhissāmi
atk-s0303a:278_5: nu kho samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, udāhu pattacīvaradhāraṇamattameva karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0303a:279_0: Kāmānametaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi ninnaṃ pallalaṃ olokentassa dassanarāmaṇeyyakamattaṃ
atk-s0303a:279_1: atthi, yo panettha otarati, taṃ caṇḍamīnākulatāya ākaḍḍhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0303a:279_2: evamevaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cakkhudvārādīnaṃ ārammaṇe rāmaṇeyyakamattaṃ atthi, yo
atk-s0303a:279_3: panettha gedhaṃ āpajjati, taṃ ākaḍḍhitvā nirayādīsu eva pakkhipanti. Appassādā hi
atk-s0303a:279_4: kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyoti imaṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca “kāmānametaṃ
atk-s0303a:279_5: adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ. Ahamanuggahenāti ahaṃ dhammāmisānuggahehi anuggaṇhāmi. Abhinandīti
atk-s0303a:279_6: sampaṭicchi. Na kevalañca abhinandi, imaṃ pana satthu santikā assāsaṃ labhitvā ghaṭento
atk-s0303a:281_0: 85. Tatiye diṭṭhigatanti sace hissa evaṃ bhaveyya “saṅkhārā uppajjanti ceva nirujjhanti
atk-s0303a:281_1: ca, saṅkhārappavattameva appavattaṃ hotī”ti, diṭṭhigataṃ nāma na bhaveyya, sāsanāvacarikaṃ
atk-s0303a:281_2: ñāṇaṃ bhaveyya. Yasmā panassa “satto ucchijjati vinassatī”ti ahosi, tasmā diṭṭhigataṃ
atk-s0303a:281_3: nāma jātaṃ. Thāmasā parāmāsāti diṭṭhithāmena ceva diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca.
atk-s0303a:282_0: Yenāyasmā sāriputtoti yathā nāma paccante kupite taṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkontā rājapurisā
atk-s0303a:282_1: senāpatissa vā rañño vā santikaṃ gacchanti, evaṃ diṭṭhigatavasena tasmiṃ there kupite
atk-s0303a:282_2: taṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkontā te bhikkhū yena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpati āyasmā sāriputto,
atk-s0303a:282_3: tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Evaṃbyākhoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike viya therassa sammukhā paggayha
atk-s0303a:282_4: vattuṃ asakkonto olambantena hadayena “evaṃbyākho”ti āha. Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvusoti?
atk-s0303a:282_5: Idaṃ thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā, “nāyaṃ attano laddhiyaṃ dosaṃ passati, dhammadesanāya
atk-s0303a:282_6: assa taṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā tiparivaṭṭaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0303a:283_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ tathāgatoti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Anuyogavattaṃ
atk-s0303a:283_1: dāpanatthaṃ. Tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasānasmiñhi thero sotāpanno jāto. Atha naṃ anuyogavattaṃ
atk-s0303a:283_2: dāpetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha? Tathāgatoti satto. Rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā
atk-s0303a:283_3: viññāṇanti ime pañcakkhandhe sampiṇḍetvā “tathāgato”ti samanupassasīti pucchati.
atk-s0303a:283_4: Ettha ca te, āvusoti idaṃ therassa anuyoge bhummaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ettha ca te
atk-s0303a:283_5: ettake ṭhāne diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thirato satte anupalabbhiyamāneti. Sace taṃ,
atk-s0303a:283_6: āvusoti idametaṃ aññaṃ byākarāpetukāmo pucchati. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ niruddhanti yaṃ
atk-s0303a:283_7: dukkhaṃ, tadeva niruddhaṃ, añño satto nirujjhanako nāma natthi, evaṃ byākareyyanti attho.
atk-s0303a:284_0: Etasseva atthassāti etassa paṭhamamaggassa. Bhiyyosomattāya ñāṇāyāti atirekappamāṇassa
atk-s0303a:284_1: ñāṇassa atthāya, sahavipassanakānaṃ upari ca tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ āvibhāvatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0303a:284_2: Ārakkhasampannoti antoārakkhena ceva bahiārakkhena ca samannāgato. Ayogakkhemakāmoti
atk-s0303a:284_3: catūhi yogehi khemabhāvaṃ anicchanto. Pasayhāti pasayhitvā abhibhavitvā. Anupakhajjāti anupavisitvā.
atk-s0303a:285_0: Pubbuṭṭhāyītiādīsu dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā āsanato paṭhamataraṃ vuṭṭhātīti pubbuṭṭhāyī.
atk-s0303a:285_1: Tassa āsanaṃ datvā tasmiṃ nisinne pacchā nipatati nisīdatīti, pacchānipātī. Pātova
atk-s0303a:285_2: vuṭṭhāya “ettakā kasituṃ gacchatha, ettakā vapitu”nti vā sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuṭṭhātīti
atk-s0303a:285_3: pubbuṭṭhāyī. Sāyaṃ sabbesu attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu gehassa samantato ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0303a:285_4: saṃvidhāya dvārāni thaketvā sabbapacchā nipajjanatopi pacchānipātī. “Kiṃ karomi,
atk-s0303a:285_5: ayyaputta? Kiṃ karomi ayyaputtā”ti? Mukhaṃ olokento kiṃkāraṃ paṭisāvetīti kiṃkārapaṭissāvī.
atk-s0303a:285_6: Manāpaṃ caratīti manāpacārī. Piyaṃ vadatīti piyavādī. Mittatopi naṃ saddaheyyāti
atk-s0303a:285_7: mitto me ayanti saddaheyya. Vissāsaṃ āpajjeyyāti ekato pānabhojanādiṃ karonto vissāsiko
atk-s0303a:286_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – bālagahapatiputto viya hi vaṭṭasannissitakāle
atk-s0303a:286_1: assutavā puthujjano, vadhakapaccāmitto viya abaladubbalā pañcakkhandhā, vadhakapaccāmittassa
atk-s0303a:286_2: “bālagahapatiputtaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti upagatakālo viya paṭisandhikkhaṇe upagatā pañcakkhandhā,
atk-s0303a:286_3: tassa hi “na me ayaṃ sahāyo, vadhakapaccatthiko aya”nti ajānanakālo viya vaṭṭanissitaputhujjanassa
atk-s0303a:286_4: pañcakkhandhe “na ime mayha”nti agahetvā “mama rūpaṃ, mama vedanā, mama saññā, mama
atk-s0303a:286_5: saṅkhārā, mama viññāṇa”nti gahitakālo, vadhakapaccatthikassa “mitto me aya”nti gahetvā
atk-s0303a:286_6: sakkārakaraṇakālo viya “mama ime”ti gahetvā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nhāpanabhojanādīhi
atk-s0303a:286_7: sakkārakaraṇakālo, “ativissattho me aya”nti ñatvā sakkāraṃ karontasseva asinā sīsacchindanaṃ
atk-s0303a:286_8: viya vissatthassa bālaputhujjanassa tikhiṇehi bhijjamānehi khandhehi jīvitapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a:287_0: Upetīti upagacchati. Upādiyatīti gaṇhāti. Adhiṭṭhātīti adhitiṭṭhati. Attā meti ayaṃ
atk-s0303a:287_1: me attāti. Sutavā ca kho, āvuso, ariyasāvakoti yathā pana paṇḍito gahapatiputto evaṃ
atk-s0303a:287_2: upagataṃ paccatthikaṃ “paccatthiko me aya”nti ñatvā appamatto tāni tāni kammāni kāretvā
atk-s0303a:287_3: anatthaṃ pariharati, atthaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ sutavā ariyasāvakopi “na rūpaṃ attato
atk-s0303a:287_4: samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena pañcakkhandhe ahanti vā mamanti vā agahetvā, “paccatthikā
atk-s0303a:287_5: me ete”ti ñatvā rūpasattakaarūpasattakādivasena vipassanāya yojetvāva tatonidānaṃ
atk-s0303a:287_6: dukkhaṃ parivajjetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0303a:289_0: 86. Catutthe araññakuṭikāyanti tasseva vihārassa paccante paṇṇasālāyaṃ. Taṃ tathāgatoti
atk-s0303a:289_1: tumhākaṃ satthā tathāgato taṃ sattaṃ tathāgataṃ. Aññatra imehīti tassa kira evaṃ
atk-s0303a:289_2: ahosi “ime sāsanassa paṭipakkhā paṭivilomā, yathā ime bhaṇanti, na evaṃ satthā paññāpessati,
atk-s0303a:289_3: aññathā paññāpessatī”ti. Tasmā evamāha. Evaṃ vutte te aññatitthiyāti evaṃ therena
atk-s0303a:289_4: attano ca paresañca samayaṃ ajānitvā vutte ekadesena sāsanasamayaṃ jānantā therassa
atk-s0303a:289_5: vāde dosaṃ dātukāmā te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṃ anurādhaṃ etadavocuṃ.
atk-s0303a:290_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi anurādhāti satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintesi – “ayaṃ bhikkhu attano
atk-s0303a:290_1: laddhiyaṃ dosaṃ na jānāti, kārako panesa yuttayogo, dhammadesanāya eva naṃ jānāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0303a:290_2: tiparivaṭṭaṃ desanaṃ desetukāmo “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādhā”tiādimāha. Athassa tāya
atk-s0303a:290_3: desanāya arahattappattassa anuyogavattaṃ āropento taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha? Rūpaṃ
atk-s0303a:290_4: tathāgatotiādimāha. Dukkhañceva paññapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodhanti vaṭṭadukkhañceva
atk-s0303a:290_5: vaṭṭadukkhassa ca nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ paññapemi. Dukkhanti vā vacanena dukkhasaccaṃ
atk-s0303a:290_6: gahitaṃ. Tasmiṃ gahite samudayasaccaṃ gahitameva hoti, tassa mūlattā. Nirodhanti
atk-s0303a:290_7: vacanena nirodhasaccaṃ gahitaṃ. Tasmiṃ gahite maggasaccaṃ gahitameva hoti tassa upāyattā.
atk-s0303a:290_8: Iti pubbe cāhaṃ, anurādha, etarahi ca catusaccameva paññapemīti dasseti. Evaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0303a:292_0: 87. Pañcame kumbhakāranivesaneti kumbhakārasālāyaṃ. Thero kira vutthavasso pavāretvā
atk-s0303a:292_1: bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgacchati. Tassa nagaramajjhe mahāābādho uppajji, pādā na vahanti.
atk-s0303a:292_2: Atha naṃ mañcakasivikāya kumbhakārasālaṃ āhariṃsu. Sā ca sālā tesaṃ kammasālā, na
atk-s0303a:292_3: nivesanasālā. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “kumbhakāranivesane viharatī”ti. Bāḷhagilānoti
atk-s0303a:292_4: adhimattagilāno. Samadhosīti samantato adhosi, calanākārena apacitiṃ dassesi. Vattaṃ
atk-s0303a:292_5: kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi buḍḍhataraṃ disvā uṭṭhānākārena apaciti dassetabbā. Tena
atk-s0303a:292_6: pana “mā cali mā calī”ti vattabbo. Santimāni āsanānīti buddhakālasmiñhi ekassapi
atk-s0303a:292_7: bhikkhuno vasanaṭṭhāne “sace satthā āgacchissati, idha nisīdissatī”ti āsanaṃ paññattameva
atk-s0303a:292_8: hoti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi. Khamanīyaṃ yāpanīyanti kacci
atk-s0303a:292_9: dukkhaṃ khamituṃ iriyāpathaṃ vā yāpetuṃ sakkāti pucchati. Paṭikkamantīti nivattanti.
atk-s0303a:292_10: Abhikkamantīti adhigacchanti. Paṭikkamosānanti paṭikkamo etāsaṃ. Sīlato na upavadatīti
atk-s0303a:292_11: sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlabhāvena na upavadati. Cirapaṭikāhanti cirapaṭiko ahaṃ, cirato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0303a:292_12: ahanti attho. Pūtikāyenāti attano suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi kāyaṃ bhagavā dhuvapaggharaṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0303a:292_13: evamāha. Yo kho, vakkali, dhammanti idha bhagavā “dhammakāyo kho, mahārāja, tathāgato”ti
atk-s0303a:292_14: vuttaṃ dhammakāyataṃ dasseti. Navavidho hi lokuttaradhammo tathāgatassa kāyo nāma.
atk-s0303a:293_0: Idāni therassa tiparivaṭṭadhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha. Kāḷasilāti
atk-s0303a:293_1: kāḷasilāvihāro. Vimokkhāyāti maggavimokkhatthāya. Suvimutto vimuccissatīti arahattaphalavimuttiyā
atk-s0303a:293_2: vimutto hutvā vimuccissati. Tā kira devatā “yena nīhārena iminā vipassanā āraddhā,
atk-s0303a:293_3: anantarāyena arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā evamāhaṃsu. Apāpakanti alāmakaṃ. Satthaṃ
atk-s0303a:293_4: āharesīti thero kira adhimāniko ahosi. So samādhivipassanāhi vikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0303a:293_5: samudācāraṃ apassanto “khīṇāsavomhī”ti saññī hutvā “kiṃ me iminā dukkhena jīvitena?
atk-s0303a:293_6: Satthaṃ āharitvā marissāmī”ti tikhiṇena satthena kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindi. Athassa dukkhā
atk-s0303a:293_7: vedanā uppajji. So tasmiṃ khaṇe attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānattā
atk-s0303a:293_8: sīghaṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ ādāya sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvāva kālamakāsi. Paccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0303a:293_9: panassa ca kathaṃ ahosīti? Khīṇāsavassa ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇā na sabbāva avassaṃ
atk-s0303a:293_10: laddhabbā, tikhiṇenāpi pana asinā sīse chijjante ekaṃ dve ñāṇāni avassaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-s0303a:294_0: Vivattakkhandhanti parivattakkhandhaṃ. Semānanti sayamānaṃ. Thero kira uttānako nipanno
atk-s0303a:294_1: satthaṃ āhari. Tassa sarīraṃ yathāṭhitameva ahosi. Sīsaṃ pana dakkhiṇapassena parivattitvā
atk-s0303a:294_2: aṭṭhāsi. Ariyasāvakā hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapasseneva kālaṃ karonti. Tenassa sarīraṃ
atk-s0303a:294_3: yathāṭhitaṃyeva ahosi. Sīsaṃ pana dakkhiṇapassena parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0303a:294_4: vivattakkhandho nāma jātotipi vadanti. Dhūmāyitattanti dhūmāyanabhāvaṃ. Timirāyitattanti
atk-s0303a:294_5: timirāyanabhāvaṃ. Dhūmavalāhakaṃ viya timiravalāhakaṃ viya cāti attho. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:296_0: 88. Chaṭṭhe kassapakārāmeti kassapaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme. Kāyasaṅkhāreti assāsapassāse.
atk-s0303a:296_1: So hi te catutthajjhānena passambhitvā passambhitvā vihāsi. Evaṃ hotīti idāni taṃ
atk-s0303a:296_2: samādhiṃ appaṭilabhantassa evaṃ hoti. No cassāhaṃ parihāyāmīti kacci nu kho ahaṃ
atk-s0303a:296_3: sāsanato na parihāyāmi? Tassa kira ābādhadosena appitappitā samāpatti parihāyi, tasmā
atk-s0303a:296_4: evaṃ cintesi. Samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññāti samādhiṃyeva sārañca sāmaññañca maññanti.
atk-s0303a:296_5: Mayhaṃ pana sāsane na etaṃ sāraṃ, vipassanāmaggaphalāni sāraṃ. So tvaṃ samādhito
atk-s0303a:296_6: parihāyanto kasmā cintesi “sāsanato parihāyāmī”ti. Evaṃ theraṃ assāsetvā idānissa
atk-s0303a:296_7: tiparivaṭṭaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha. Athassa tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne
atk-s0303a:296_8: arahattaṃ pattassa satatavihāraṃ dassento so sukhaṃ ce vedanaṃ vedayatītiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:296_9: Tattha anabhinanditāti pajānātīti sukhavedanāya tāva abhinandanā hotu, dukkhavedanāya
atk-s0303a:296_10: kathaṃ hotīti? Dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ pattheti, yadaggena sukhaṃ pattheti, tadaggena
atk-s0303a:296_11: dukkhaṃ patthetiyeva. Sukhavipariṇāmena hi dukkhaṃ āgatameva hotīti evaṃ dukkhe abhinandanā
atk-s0303a:298_0: 89. Sattame attaniyanti attano parikkhārajātaṃ. Asmīti adhigatanti asmīti evaṃ pavattā
atk-s0303a:298_1: taṇhāmānā adhigatā. Sandhāvanikāyāti punappunaṃ gamanāgamanena. Upasaṅkamīti badarikārāmato
atk-s0303a:298_2: gāvutamattaṃ ghositārāmaṃ agamāsi. Dāsakatthero pana catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanena
atk-s0303a:298_3: taṃdivasaṃ dviyojanaṃ addhānaṃ āhiṇḍi. Kasmā pana taṃ therā pahiṇiṃsu? Vissutassa
atk-s0303a:298_4: dhammakathikassa santikā dhammaṃ suṇissāmāti. Sayaṃ kasmā na gatāti? Therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0303a:298_5: araññaṃ sambādhaṃ, tattha saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso natthīti
atk-s0303a:298_6: na gatā. “Idhāgantvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ kathetū”tipi kasmā pana na pahiṇiṃsūti? Therassa
atk-s0303a:298_7: ābādhikattā. Atha kasmā punappunaṃ pahiṇiṃsūti? Sayameva ñatvā amhākaṃ kathetuṃ āgamissatīti.
atk-s0303a:299_0: Na khvāhaṃ, āvuso, rūpanti yo hi rūpameva asmīti vadati, tena itare cattāro khandhā
atk-s0303a:299_1: paccakkhātā honti. Yo aññatra rūpā vadati, tena rūpaṃ paccakkhātaṃ hoti. Vedanādīsupi
atk-s0303a:299_2: eseva nayo. Therassa pana samūhato pañcasupi khandhesu asmīti adhigato, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0303a:299_3: Hotevāti hotiyeva. Anusahagatoti sukhumo. Ūseti chārikākhāre. Khāreti ūsakhāre. Sammadditvāti temetvā khādetvā.
atk-s0303a:300_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya hi puthujjanassa
atk-s0303a:300_1: cittācāro, tayo khārā viya tisso anupassanā, tīhi khārehi dhotavatthaṃ viya desanāya
atk-s0303a:300_2: madditvā ṭhito anāgāmino cittācāro, anusahagato ūsādigandho viya arahattamaggavajjhā
atk-s0303a:300_3: kilesā, gandhakaraṇḍako viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ gandhakaraṇḍakaṃ āgamma anusahagatānaṃ
atk-s0303a:300_4: ūsagandhādīnaṃ samugghāto viya arahattamaggena sabbakilesakkhayo, gandhaparibhāvitavatthaṃ
atk-s0303a:300_5: nivāsetvā chaṇadivase antaravīthiyaṃ sugandhagandhino vicaraṇaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0303a:301_0: Ācikkhitunti kathetuṃ. Desetunti pakāsetuṃ. Paññāpetunti jānāpetuṃ. Paṭṭhapetunti
atk-s0303a:301_1: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ. Vivaritunti vivaṭaṃ kātuṃ. Vibhajitunti suvibhattaṃ kātuṃ. Uttānīkātunti
atk-s0303a:301_2: uttānakaṃ kātuṃ. Saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānanti te kira therena kathitakathitaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ
atk-s0303a:301_3: paṭṭhapetvā uparūpari sammasantā desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Theropi aññena
atk-s0303a:301_4: nīhārena akathetvā vipassanāsahagatacitteneva kathesi. Tasmā sopi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0303a:301_5: Tena vuttaṃ – “saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu
atk-s0303a:303_0: 90. Aṭṭhame āyasmā channoti tathāgatena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto mahābhinikkhamanadivase
atk-s0303a:303_1: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā puna aparabhāge satthu santike pabbajitvā “amhākaṃ buddho amhākaṃ
atk-s0303a:303_2: dhammo”ti evaṃ makkhī ceva paḷāsī ca hutvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ pharusavācāya saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0303a:303_3: karonto thero. Avāpuraṇaṃ ādāyāti kuñcikaṃ gahetvā. Vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvāti
atk-s0303a:303_4: ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti evaṃ tena tena vihārena taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0303a:303_5: upasaṅkamitvā. Etadavoca ovadantu manti kasmā evaṃ mahantena ussāhena tattha tattha
atk-s0303a:303_6: gantvā etaṃ avocāti? Uppannasaṃvegatāya. Tassa hi parinibbute satthari dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
atk-s0303a:303_7: pesito āyasmā ānando kosambiṃ gantvā brahmadaṇḍaṃ adāsi. So dinne brahmadaṇḍe sañjātapariḷāho
atk-s0303a:303_8: visaññībhūto patitvā puna saññaṃ labhitvā vuṭṭhāya ekassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0303a:303_9: so tena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi. Aññassa santikaṃ agamāsi, sopi na kathesīti evaṃ
atk-s0303a:303_10: sakalavihāraṃ vicaritvā nibbinno pattacīvaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0303a:304_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā aniccā. Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbe
atk-s0303a:304_1: catubhūmakadhammā anattā. Iti sabbepi te bhikkhū theraṃ ovadantā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0303a:304_2: anattalakkhaṇanti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathetvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na kathayiṃsu. Kasmā?
atk-s0303a:304_3: Evaṃ kira nesaṃ ahosi – “ayaṃ bhikkhu vādī dukkhalakkhaṇe paññāpiyamāne rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0303a:304_4: viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, maggo dukkho, phalaṃ dukkhanti ‘tumhe dukkhappattā bhikkhū nāmā’ti
atk-s0303a:304_5: gahaṇaṃ gaṇheyya, yathā gahaṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ niddosamevassa katvā kathessāmā”ti
atk-s0303a:305_0: Paritassanā upādānaṃ uppajjatīti paritassanā ca upādānañca uppajjati. Paccudāvattati
atk-s0303a:305_1: mānasaṃ, atha ko carahi me attāti yadi rūpādīsu ekopi anattā, atha ko nāma me attāti
atk-s0303a:305_2: evaṃ paṭinivattati “mayhaṃ mānasa”nti. Ayaṃ kira thero paccaye apariggahetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0303a:305_3: paṭṭhapesi, sāssa dubbalavipassanā attagāhaṃ pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇantī saṅkhāresu suññato
atk-s0303a:305_5: ca paccayo ahosi. So ca attānaṃ pāpate papatantaṃ viya disvā, “paritassanā upādānaṃ
atk-s0303a:305_6: uppajjati, paccudāvattati mānasaṃ, atha ko carahi me attā”ti āha. Na kho panevaṃ
atk-s0303a:305_7: dhammaṃ passato hotīti catusaccadhammaṃ passantassa evaṃ na hoti. Tāvatikā vissaṭṭhīti
atk-s0303a:305_8: tattako vissāso. Sammukhā metanti thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā, “kīdisā nu kho imassa
atk-s0303a:305_9: dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti? Cintento tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vicinitvā kaccānasuttaṃ
atk-s0303a:305_10: addasa “idaṃ āditova diṭṭhiviniveṭhanaṃ katvā majjhe buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā saṇhasukhumapaccayākāraṃ
atk-s0303a:305_11: pakāsayamānaṃ gataṃ, idamassa desessāmī”ti dassento “sammukhā meta”ntiādimāha. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:307: 91-92. Navamadasamāni rāhulasaṃyutte vuttatthāneva. Kevalaṃ hetāni ayaṃ theravaggoti katvā idhāgatānīti. Navamadasamāni.
atk-s0303a:311_0: 93. Pupphavaggassa paṭhame pabbateyyāti pabbate pavattā. Ohārinīti sote patitapatitāni
atk-s0303a:311_1: tiṇapaṇṇakaṭṭhādīni heṭṭhāhārinī. Dūraṅgamāti nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya catupañcayojanasatagāminī.
atk-s0303a:311_2: Sīghasotāti caṇḍasotā. Kāsātiādīni sabbāni tiṇajātāni. Rukkhāti eraṇḍādayo dubbalarukkhā.
atk-s0303a:311_3: Te naṃ ajjholambeyyunti te tīre jātāpi onamitvā aggehi udakaṃ phusantehi adhiolambeyyuṃ,
atk-s0303a:311_4: upari lambeyyunti attho. Palujjeyyunti samūlamattikāya saddhiṃ sīse pateyyuṃ. So
atk-s0303a:311_5: tehi ajjhotthaṭo vālukamattikodakehi mukhaṃ pavisantehi mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0303a:312_0: Evameva khoti ettha sote patitapuriso viya vaṭṭasannissito bālaputhujjano daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0303a:312_1: ubhatotīre kāsādayo viya dubbalapañcakkhandhā, “ime gahitāpi maṃ tāretuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti
atk-s0303a:312_2: tassa purisassa ajānitvā gahaṇaṃ viya ime khandhā “na mayhaṃ sahāyā”ti bālaputhujjanassa
atk-s0303a:312_3: ajānitvā catūhi gāhehi gahaṇaṃ, gahitagahitānaṃ palujjanattā purisassa byasanappatti
atk-s0303a:312_4: viya catūhi gāhehi gahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ vipariṇāme bālaputhujjanassa sokādibyasanappatti
atk-s0303a:314_0: 94. Dutiye vivadatīti “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubha”nti yathāsabhāvena vadantena
atk-s0303a:314_1: saddhiṃ “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti vadanto vivadati. Lokadhammoti khandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0303a:314_2: Tañhi lujjanasabhāvattā lokadhammoti vuccati. Kinti karomīti kathaṃ karomi? Mayhañhi
atk-s0303a:314_3: paṭipattikathanameva bhāro, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ pana kulaputtānaṃ bhāroti dasseti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0303a:314_4: sutte tayo lokā kathitā. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokenā”ti ettha hi sattaloko kathito,
atk-s0303a:314_5: “atthi, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo”ti ettha saṅkhāraloko, “tathāgato loke jāto loke
atk-s0303a:316_0: 95. Tatiye gaṅgāya nadiyā tīreti ayujjhapuravāsino aparimāṇabhikkhuparivāraṃ cārikaṃ
atk-s0303a:316_1: caramānaṃ tathāgataṃ attano nagaraṃ sampattaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ gaṅgāya nivattanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0303a:316_2: mahāvanasaṇḍamaṇḍitappadese satthu vihāraṃ katvā adaṃsu. Bhagavā tattha viharati.
atk-s0303a:316_3: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre”ti. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti
atk-s0303a:316_4: tasmiṃ vihāre vasanto bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā gaṅgātīre paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0303a:316_5: nisinno gaṅgāya nadiyā āgacchantaṃ mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ disvā, “mama sāsane pañcakkhandhanissitaṃ
atk-s0303a:316_6: ekaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī”ti cintetvā parivāretvā nisinne bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0303a:317_0: Mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍanti uṭṭhānuṭṭhāne badarapakkappamāṇato paṭṭhāya anusotāgamanena
atk-s0303a:317_1: anupubbena pavaḍḍhitvā pabbatakūṭamattaṃ jātaṃ, yattha udakasappādayo anekapāṇayo
atk-s0303a:317_2: nivasanti, evarūpaṃ mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ. Āvaheyyāti āhareyya. So panāyaṃ pheṇapiṇḍo
atk-s0303a:317_3: uṭṭhitaṭṭhānepi bhijjati, thokaṃ gantvāpi, ekadviyojanādivasena dūraṃ gantvāpi, antarā
atk-s0303a:317_4: pana abhijjantopi mahāsamuddaṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati. Nijjhāyeyyāti olokeyya.
atk-s0303a:317_5: Yoniso upaparikkheyyāti kāraṇena upaparikkheyya. Kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, pheṇapiṇḍe
atk-s0303a:317_6: sāroti, bhikkhave, pheṇapiṇḍamhi sāro nāma kiṃ bhaveyya? Vilīyitvā viddhaṃseyyeva.
atk-s0303a:318_0: Evameva khoti yathā pheṇapiṇḍo nissāro, evaṃ rūpampi niccasāradhuvasāraattasāravirahena
atk-s0303a:318_1: nissārameva. Yathā ca so “iminā pattaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā karissāmī”ti gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0303a:318_2: gahitopi tamatthaṃ na sādheti, bhijjati eva, evaṃ rūpampi niccanti vā dhuvanti vā
atk-s0303a:318_3: ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetuṃ na sakkā, gahitampi na tathā tiṭṭhati, aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0303a:318_4: anattā asubhaññeva hotīti evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍasadisameva hoti. Yathā vā pana pheṇapiṇḍo
atk-s0303a:318_5: chiddāvachiddo anekasandhighaṭito bahūnaṃ udakasappādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ āvāso, evaṃ rūpampi
atk-s0303a:318_6: chiddāvachiddaṃ anekasandhighaṭitaṃ, kulavasenevettha asīti kimikulāni vasanti, tadeva
atk-s0303a:318_7: tesaṃ sūtigharampi vaccakuṭipi gilānasālāpi susānampi, na te aññattha gantvā gabbhavuṭṭhānādīni
atk-s0303a:319_0: Yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo ādito badarapakkamatto hutvā anupubbena pabbatakūṭamattopi hoti,
atk-s0303a:319_1: evaṃ rūpampi ādito kalalamattaṃ hutvā anupubbena byāmamattampi gomahiṃsahatthiādīnaṃ
atk-s0303a:319_2: vasena pabbatakūṭādimattaṃ hoti macchakacchapādīnaṃ vasena anekayojanasatapamāṇampi,
atk-s0303a:319_3: evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ. Yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo uṭṭhitamattopi bhijjati, thokaṃ gantvāpi,
atk-s0303a:319_4: dūraṃ gantvāpi, samuddaṃ patvā pana avassameva bhijjati, evamevaṃ rūpampi kalalabhāvepi
atk-s0303a:319_5: bhijjati abbudādibhāvepi, antarā pana abhijjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ
atk-s0303a:319_6: patvā avassameva bhijjati, maraṇamukhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti, evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ.
atk-s0303a:320_0: Kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, vedanāya sārotiādīsu vedanādīnaṃ pubbuḷādīhi evaṃ sadisatā
atk-s0303a:320_1: veditabbā. Yathā hi pubbuḷo asāro evaṃ vedanāpi. Yathā ca so abalo agayhūpago, na
atk-s0303a:320_2: sakkā taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ, gahitopi bhijjateva, evaṃ vedanāpi
atk-s0303a:320_3: abalā agayhūpagā, na sakkā niccāti vā dhuvāti vā gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0303a:320_4: evaṃ agayhūpagatāyapi vedanā pubbuḷasadisā. Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udakabindumhi
atk-s0303a:320_5: pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca, na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti, evaṃ vedanāpi uppajjati
atk-s0303a:320_6: ceva bhijjati ca, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti. Ekaccharakkhaṇe koṭisatasahassasaṅkhā uppajjitvā
atk-s0303a:320_7: nirujjhati. Yathā ca pubbuḷo udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallaṃ, saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ
atk-s0303a:320_8: katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati, evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0303a:320_9: kilesajallaṃ phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati. Evampi vedanā pubbuḷasadisā.
atk-s0303a:321_0: Saññāpi asārakaṭṭhena marīcisadisā. Tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena. Na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0303a:321_1: pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ. Apica yathā marīci vipphandati, sañjātūmivegā
atk-s0303a:321_2: viya khāyati, evaṃ nīlasaññādibhedā saññāpi nīlādianubhavanatthāya phandati vipphandati.
atk-s0303a:321_3: Yathā ca marīci mahājanaṃ vippalambheti “puṇṇavāpi viya puṇṇanadī viya dissatī”ti
atk-s0303a:321_4: vadāpeti, evaṃ saññāpi vippalambheti, “idaṃ nīlakaṃ subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca”nti vadāpeti.
atk-s0303a:321_5: Pītakādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ saññā vippalambhanenāpi marīcisadisā.
atk-s0303a:322_0: Akukkukajātanti anto asañjātaghanadaṇḍakaṃ. Saṅkhārāpi asārakaṭṭhena kadalikkhandhasadisā,
atk-s0303a:322_1: tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena. Yatheva hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasiādīnaṃ
atk-s0303a:322_2: atthāya upanetuṃ, upanītampi na tathā hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārāpi na sakkā niccādivasena
atk-s0303a:322_3: gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā honti. Yathā ca kadalikkhandho bahupattavaṭṭisamodhāno
atk-s0303a:322_4: hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandho bahudhammasamodhāno. Yathā ca kadalikkhandho nānālakkhaṇo.
atk-s0303a:322_5: Aññoyeva hi bāhirāya pattavaṭṭiyā vaṇṇo, añño tato abbhantaraabbhantarānaṃ, evameva
atk-s0303a:322_6: saṅkhārakkhandhepi aññadeva phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ, aññā cetanādīnaṃ, samodhānetvā pana
atk-s0303a:323_0: Cakkhumā purisoti maṃsacakkhunā ceva paññācakkhunā cāti dvīhi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.
atk-s0303a:323_1: Maṃsacakkhumpi hissa parisuddhaṃ vaṭṭati apagatapaṭalapiḷakaṃ, paññācakkhumpi asārabhāvadassanasamatthaṃ.
atk-s0303a:323_2: Viññāṇampi asārakaṭṭhena māyāsadisaṃ, tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena. Yathā ca māyā ittarā
atk-s0303a:323_3: lahupaccupaṭṭhānā, evaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tañhi tatopi ittaratarañceva lahupaccupaṭṭhānatarañca.
atk-s0303a:323_4: Teneva hi cittena puriso āgato viya gato viya ṭhito viya nisinno viya hoti. Aññadeva
atk-s0303a:323_5: ca āgamanakāle cittaṃ, aññaṃ gamanakālādīsu. Evampi viññāṇaṃ māyāsadisaṃ. Māyā ca
atk-s0303a:323_6: mahājanaṃ vañceti, yaṃkiñcideva “idaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā”ti gāhāpeti, viññāṇampi
atk-s0303a:323_7: mahājanaṃ vañceti. Teneva hi cittena āgacchantaṃ viya gacchantaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ viya
atk-s0303a:323_8: nisinnaṃ viya katvā gāhāpeti. Aññadeva ca āgamane cittaṃ, aññaṃ gamanādīsu. Evampi
atk-s0303a:324_0: Bhūripaññenāti saṇhapaññena ceva vipulavitthatapaññena ca. Āyūti jīvitindriyaṃ. Usmāti
atk-s0303a:324_1: kammajatejodhātu. Parabhattanti nānāvidhānaṃ kimigaṇādīnaṃ bhattaṃ hutvā. Etādisāyaṃ
atk-s0303a:324_2: santānoti etādisī ayaṃ paveṇī matakassa yāva susānā ghaṭṭīyatīti. Māyāyaṃ bālalāpinīti
atk-s0303a:324_3: yvāyaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāma, ayaṃ bālamahājanalapāpanikamāyā nāma. Vadhakoti dvīhi
atk-s0303a:324_4: kāraṇehi ayaṃ khandhasaṅkhāto vadhako aññamaññaghātanenapi, khandhesu sati vadho
atk-s0303a:324_5: paññāyatītipi. Ekā hi pathavīdhātu bhijjamānā sesadhātuyo gahetvāva bhijjati, tathā
atk-s0303a:324_6: āpodhātuādayo. Rūpakkhandho ca bhijjamāno arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati, tathā
atk-s0303a:324_7: arūpakkhandhesu vedanādayo saññādike. Cattāropi cete vatthurūpanti evaṃ aññamaññavadhanenettha
atk-s0303a:324_8: vadhakatā veditabbā. Khandhesu pana sati vadhabandhanacchedādīni sambhavanti, evaṃ
atk-s0303a:324_9: etesu sati vadhabhāvatopi vadhakatā veditabbā. Sabbasaṃyoganti sabbaṃ dasavidhampi
atk-s0303a:326_1: Parittaṃ gomayapiṇḍanti appamattakaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇaṃ gomayakhaṇḍaṃ. Kuto panānenetaṃ
atk-s0303a:326_2: laddhanti. Paribhaṇḍakaraṇatthāya ābhatato gahitanti eke. Atthassa pana viññāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0303a:326_3: iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā hatthāruḷhaṃ katanti veditabbanti. Attabhāvapaṭilābhoti paṭiladdhaattabhāvo.
atk-s0303a:326_4: Na yidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyethāti ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyavāso nāma na paññāyeyya.
atk-s0303a:326_5: Maggo hi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre vivaṭṭento uppajjati. Yadi ca ettako attabhāvo nicco bhaveyya,
atk-s0303a:326_6: maggo uppajjitvāpi saṅkhāravaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti brahmacariyavāso na paññāyetha.
atk-s0303a:327_0: Idāni sace koci saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, mayā mahāsudassanarājakāle anubhūtā sampatti
atk-s0303a:327_1: niccā bhaveyya, sāpi ca aniccāti taṃ dassetuṃ bhūtapubbāhaṃ bhikkhu rājā ahosintiādimāha.
atk-s0303a:327_2: Tattha kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhānīti kusāvatīrājadhānī tesaṃ nagarānaṃ pamukhā, sabbaseṭṭhāti
atk-s0303a:327_3: attho. Sāramayānīti rattacandanasāramayāni. Upadhānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ suttamayameva.
atk-s0303a:327_4: Goṇakatthatānīti caturaṅgulādhikalomena kāḷakojavena atthatāni, yaṃ mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavoti
atk-s0303a:327_5: vadanti. Paṭakatthatānīti ubhatolomena uṇṇāmayena setakambalena atthatāni. Paṭalikatthatānīti
atk-s0303a:327_7: uttamapaccattharaṇena atthatāni. Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ
atk-s0303a:327_8: attharitvā sibbetvā karonti. Sauttaracchadānīti saha uttaracchadena, upari baddhena
atk-s0303a:327_9: rattavitānena saddhinti attho. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānīti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti
atk-s0303a:327_10: pallaṅkānaṃ ubhatolohitakūpadhānāni. Vejayantarathappamukhānīti ettha vejayanto nāma
atk-s0303a:327_11: tassa rañño ratho, yassa cakkānaṃ indanīlamaṇimayā nābhi, sattaratanamayā arā, pavāḷamayā
atk-s0303a:327_12: nemi, rajatamayo akkho, indanīlamaṇimayaṃ upakkharaṃ, rajatamayaṃ kubbaraṃ. So tesaṃ
atk-s0303a:327_13: rathānaṃ pamukho aggo. Dukūlasandānānīti dukūlasantharāni. Kaṃsūpadhāraṇānīti rajatamayadohabhājanāni.
atk-s0303a:327_14: Vatthakoṭisahassānīti yathārucitaṃ paribhuñjissatīti nhatvā ṭhitakāle upanītavatthāneva
atk-s0303a:328_0: Yamahaṃ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmīti yattha vasāmi, taṃ ekaññeva nagaraṃ hoti, avasesesu
atk-s0303a:328_1: puttadhītādayo ceva dāsamanussā ca vasiṃsu. Pāsādakūṭāgārādīsupi eseva nayo. Pallaṅkādīsu
atk-s0303a:328_2: ekaṃyeva sayaṃ paribhuñjati, sesā puttādīnaṃ paribhogā honti. Itthīsu ekāva paccupaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0303a:328_3: sesā parivāramattā honti. Velāmikāti khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇiyā, brāhmaṇassa vā khattiyāniyā
atk-s0303a:328_4: kucchismiṃ jātā. Paridahāmīti ekaṃyeva dussayugaṃ nivāsemi, sesāni parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ
atk-s0303a:328_5: asītisahassādhikānaṃ soḷasannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hontīti dasseti. Bhuñjāmīti
atk-s0303a:328_6: paramappamāṇena nāḷikodanamattaṃ bhuñjāmi, sesaṃ parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ cattālīsasahassādhikānaṃ
atk-s0303a:328_7: aṭṭhannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Ekathālipāko hi dasannaṃ janānaṃ pahoti.
atk-s0303a:329_0: Iti imaṃ mahāsudassanakāle sampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tassā aniccataṃ dassento iti
atk-s0303a:329_1: kho bhikkhūtiādimāha. Tattha vipariṇatāti pakatijahanena nibbutapadīpo viya apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0303a:329_2: gatā. Evaṃ aniccā kho bhikkhu saṅkhārāti evaṃ hutvāabhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. Ettāvatā
atk-s0303a:329_3: bhagavā yathā nāma puriso satahatthubbedhe campakarukkhe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā abhiruhitvā
atk-s0303a:329_4: campakapupphaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto otareyya, evamevaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhanto viya
atk-s0303a:329_6: aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viya otiṇṇo. Evaṃ addhuvāti evaṃ udakapubbuḷādayo
atk-s0303a:329_7: viya dhuvabhāvarahitā. Evaṃ anassāsikāti evaṃ supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ
atk-s0303a:329_8: viya ca assāsavirahitā. Iti imasmiṃ sutte aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ. Pañcame sabbaṃ
atk-s0303a:329_9: vuttanayameva. Chaṭṭhaṃ tathā bujjhanakassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Catutthādīni.
atk-s0303a:331_0: 99. Sattame yaṃ mahāsamuddoti yasmiṃ samaye pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite mahāsamuddo ussussati.
atk-s0303a:331_1: Dukkhassa antakiriyanti cattāri saccāni appaṭivijjhitvā avijjāya nivutānaṃyeva sataṃ
atk-s0303a:331_2: vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyaṃ paricchedaṃ na vadāmi. Sā gaddulabaddhoti gaddulena baddhasunakho.
atk-s0303a:331_3: Khīleti pathaviyaṃ ākoṭite mahākhīle. Thambheti nikhaṇitvā ṭhapite thambhe. Evameva
atk-s0303a:331_4: khoti ettha sunakho viya vaṭṭanissito bālo, gaddulo viya diṭṭhi, thambho viya sakkāyo,
atk-s0303a:331_5: gaddularajjuyā thambhe upanibaddhasunakhassa thambhānuparivattanaṃ viya diṭṭhitaṇhāya
atk-s0303a:331_6: sakkāye baddhassa puthujjanassa sakkāyānuparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:333_0: 100. Aṭṭhame tasmāti yasmā diṭṭhigaddulanissitāya taṇhārajjuyā sakkāyathambhe upanibaddho
atk-s0303a:333_1: vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano sabbiriyāpathesu khandhapañcakaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
atk-s0303a:333_2: yasmā vā dīgharattamidaṃ cittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rāgena dosena mohena, tasmā. Cittasaṃkilesāti
atk-s0303a:333_3: sunhātāpi hi sattā cittasaṃkileseneva saṃkilissanti, malaggahitasarīrāpi cittassa
atk-s0303a:337: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti.
atk-s0303a:338_0: Caraṇaṃ nāma cittanti vicaraṇacittaṃ. Saṅkhā nāma brāhmaṇapāsaṇḍikā honti, te paṭakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0303a:338_1: katvā tattha nānappakārā sugatiduggativasena sampattivipattiyo lekhāpetvā, “imaṃ
atk-s0303a:338_2: kammaṃ katvā idaṃ paṭilabhati, idaṃ katvā ida”nti dassentā taṃ cittaṃ gahetvā vicaranti.
atk-s0303a:338_3: Citteneva cittitanti cittakārena cintetvā katattā cittena cintitaṃ nāma. Cittaññeva
atk-s0303a:338_4: cittataranti tassa cittassa upāyapariyesanacittaṃ tatopi cittataraṃ. Tiracchānagatā
atk-s0303a:338_5: pāṇā citteneva cittitāti kammacitteneva cittitā. Taṃ pana kammacittaṃ ime vaṭṭakatittirādayo
atk-s0303a:338_6: “evaṃ cittā bhavissāmā”ti āyūhantā nāma natthi. Kammaṃ pana yoniṃ upaneti, yonimūlako
atk-s0303a:338_7: tesaṃ cittabhāvo. Yoniupagatā hi sattā taṃtaṃyonikehi sadisacittāva honti. Iti yonisiddho
atk-s0303a:339_0: Apica cittaṃ nāmetaṃ sahajātaṃ sahajātadhammacittatāya bhūmicittatāya vatthucittatāya
atk-s0303a:339_2: anekavidhānaṃ cittānaṃ nipphādanatāyapi tiracchānagatacittato cittatarameva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0303a:340_0: Rajakoti vatthesu raṅgena rūpasamuṭṭhāpanako. So pana acheko amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ karoti,
atk-s0303a:340_1: cheko manāpaṃ dassanīyaṃ, evameva puthujjano akusalacittena vā ñāṇavippayuttakusalena
atk-s0303a:340_2: vā cakkhusampadādivirahitaṃ virūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, ñāṇasampayuttakusalena cakkhusampadādisampannaṃ
atk-s0303a:342_0: 101. Navame seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍānīti imā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena
atk-s0303a:342_1: dve upamā vuttā. Tāsu kaṇhapakkhaupamā atthassa asādhikā, itarā sādhikāti. Sukkapakkhaupamāya
atk-s0303a:342_2: evaṃ attho veditabbo – seyyathāti opammatthe nipāto, apīti sambhāvanatthe. Ubhayenāpi
atk-s0303a:342_3: seyyathā nāma, bhikkhaveti dasseti. Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dasa vā dvādasa
atk-s0303a:342_4: vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti, vacanasiliṭṭhatāya
atk-s0303a:342_5: pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti. Tānassūti tāni assu, tāni bhaveyyunti
atk-s0303a:342_6: attho. Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya ca janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā
atk-s0303a:342_7: tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni. Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ
atk-s0303a:342_8: gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni usmīkatāni. Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0303a:342_9: suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni, kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānīti attho. Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyāti
atk-s0303a:342_10: tassā kukkuṭiyā iminā tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā
atk-s0303a:342_11: upajjeyya. Atha kho bhabbāva teti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā
atk-s0303a:342_12: abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva. Te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni
atk-s0303a:342_13: paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti, yo nesaṃ allasineho, sopi pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0303a:342_14: kapālaṃ tanukaṃ hoti, pādanakhasikhā ca mukhatuṇḍakañca kharaṃ hoti, sayampi pariṇāmaṃ
atk-s0303a:342_15: gacchanti, kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati, tasmā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā
atk-s0303a:342_16: sambādhe sayimhā, ayañca bahi āloko dissati, ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0303a:342_17: nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti, gīvaṃ pasārenti, tato taṃ kapālaṃ
atk-s0303a:342_18: dvedhā bhijjati. Atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva,
atk-s0303a:343_0: Evameva khoti idaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsanditvā veditabbaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_1: – tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno bhāvānuyogaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_2: anuyuttakālo, kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa
atk-s0303a:343_3: bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni, tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena
atk-s0303a:343_4: allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ,
atk-s0303a:343_5: aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya tassa bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_6: pādanakhasikhamukhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasanna
atk-s0303a:343_7: sūrabhāvo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo
atk-s0303a:343_8: vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena
atk-s0303a:343_9: vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0303a:343_10: vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ vā bhojanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_11: vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_12: vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe
atk-s0303a:343_13: papphoṭetvā sotthinā arahattapattakālo veditabbo. Yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0303a:343_14: ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati, evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi –
atk-s0303a:346_0: Ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati. So gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0303a:346_1: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā
atk-s0303a:346_2: gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha vicaranti, evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0303a:347_0: Palagaṇḍassāti vaḍḍhakissa. So hi olambakasaṅkhātaṃ palaṃ dhāretvā dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0303a:347_1: haratīti palagaṇḍoti vuccati. Vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍakassa gahaṇaṭṭhāne. Ettakaṃ vata
atk-s0303a:347_2: me ajja āsavānaṃ khīṇanti pabbajitassa hi pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesena paripucchāya
atk-s0303a:347_3: yoniso manasikārena vattapaṭipattiyā ca niccakālaṃ āsavā khīyanti. Evaṃ khīyamānānaṃ
atk-s0303a:347_4: pana tesaṃ “ettakaṃ ajja khīṇaṃ, ettakaṃ hiyyo”ti evamassa ñāṇaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a:347_5: Imāya upamāya vipassanāyānisaṃso dīpito. Hemantikenāti hemantasamayena. Paṭippassambhantīti
atk-s0303a:348_0: Evameva khoti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nāvā viya yogāvacaro, nāvāya
atk-s0303a:348_1: mahāsamudde pariyādānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0303a:348_2: santike vicaraṇaṃ, nāvāya mahāsamuddodakena khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya
atk-s0303a:348_3: bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesaparipucchādīhi ceva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo, nāvāya
atk-s0303a:348_4: thale ukkhittakālo viya bhikkhuno nissayamuccakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo,
atk-s0303a:348_5: divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsnehasaṃsussanaṃ, rattiṃ himodakena
atk-s0303a:348_6: temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ, rattindivaṃ
atk-s0303a:348_7: vātātapena ceva himodakena ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya
atk-s0303a:348_8: ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0303a:348_9: dubbalabhāvo, pāvussakamegho viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ, meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya bandhe
atk-s0303a:348_10: pūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne
atk-s0303a:348_11: pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa
atk-s0303a:348_12: arahattaphalādhigamo, pūtibandhanāvāya kañci kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa
atk-s0303a:348_13: arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pūtibandhanāvāya anupubbena
atk-s0303a:348_14: bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa upādiṇṇakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya
atk-s0303a:348_15: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0303a:350_0: 102. Dasame aniccasaññāti aniccaṃ aniccanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā. Pariyādiyatīti
atk-s0303a:350_1: khepayati. Sabbaṃ asmimānanti navavidhaṃ asmimānaṃ. Mūlasantānakānīti santānetvā
atk-s0303a:350_2: ṭhitamūlāni. Mahānaṅgalaṃ viya hi aniccasaññā, khuddānukhuddakāni mūlasantānakāni
atk-s0303a:350_3: viya kilesā, yathā kassako kasanto naṅgalena tāni padāleti, evaṃ yogī aniccasaññaṃ
atk-s0303a:350_4: bhāvento aniccasaññāñāṇena kilese padāletīti idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ.
atk-s0303a:351_0: Odhunātīti heṭṭhā dhunāti. Niddhunātīti papphoṭeti. Nicchoṭetīti papphoṭetvā chaḍḍeti.
atk-s0303a:351_1: Idhāpi pabbajāni viya kilesā, lāyanaṃ nicchoṭanaṃ viya aniccasaññāñāṇanti iminā atthena
atk-s0303a:352_0: Vaṇṭacchinnāyāti tiṇhena khurappena vaṇṭacchinnāya. Tadanvayāni bhavantīti taṃ ambapiṇḍiṃ
atk-s0303a:352_1: anugacchanti, tassā patamānāya ambāni bhūmiyaṃ patanti. Idhāpi ambapiṇḍi viya kilesā,
atk-s0303a:352_2: tiṇhakhurappo viya aniccasaññā, yathā khurappena chinnāya ambapiṇḍiyā sabbāni ambāni
atk-s0303a:352_3: bhūmiyaṃ patanti, evaṃ aniccasaññāñāṇena kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtāya avijjāya chinnāya
atk-s0303a:353_0: Kūṭaṅgamāti kūṭaṃ gacchanti. Kūṭaninnāti kūṭaṃ pavisanabhāvena kūṭe ninnā. Kūṭasamosaraṇāti
atk-s0303a:353_1: kūṭe samosaritvā ṭhitā. Idhāpi kūṭaṃ viya aniccasaññā, gopānasiyo viya catubhūmakakusaladhammā,
atk-s0303a:353_2: yathā sabbagopānasīnaṃ kūṭaṃ aggaṃ, evaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ aniccasaññā aggā. Nanu ca
atk-s0303a:353_3: aniccasaññā lokiyā, sā lokiyakusalānaṃ tāva aggaṃ hotu, lokuttarānaṃ kathaṃ agganti?
atk-s0303a:353_4: Tesampi paṭilābhakaraṇatthena agganti veditabbā. Iminā upāyena sabbāsu upamāsu opammasaṃsandanaṃ
atk-s0303a:353_5: veditabbaṃ. Purimāhi panettha tīhi aniccasaññāya kiccaṃ, pacchimāhi balanti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:358: 103. Antavaggassa paṭhame antāti koṭṭhāsā. Idaṃ suttaṃ catusaccavasena pañcakkhandhe yojetvā antoti vacanena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:360_0: 104-105. Dutiyampi pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā dukkhanti bujjhanakānaṃ
atk-s0303a:360_1: ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ. Tatiyampi tatheva sakkāyoti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ. Dutiyatatiyāni.
atk-s0303a:362_0: 106. Catutthe pariññeyyeti parijānitabbe samatikkamitabbe. Pariññanti samatikkamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:362_1: Pariññātāvinti tāya pariññāya parijānitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ. Rāgakkhayotiādīhi
atk-s0303a:364: 107-112. Pañcamādīsu catūsu cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Navamadasamesu kilesappahānanti. Pañcamādīni.
atk-s0303a:368_0: 113-114. Dhammakathikavaggassa paṭhame ettāvatā ca avijjāgato hotīti yāvatā imāya
atk-s0303a:368_1: catūsu saccesu aññāṇabhūtāya avijjāya samannāgato, ettāvatā avijjāgato hotīti attho.
atk-s0303a:370: 115. Tatiye paṭhamena dhammakathiko, dutiyena sekhabhūmi, tatiyena asekhabhūmīti evaṃ dhammakathikaṃ pucchitena visesetvā dve bhūmiyo kathitā. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0303a:372: 116. Catutthe tissannampi pucchānaṃ tīṇi vissajjanāni kathitāni. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0303a:374_0: 117-121. Pañcame atīradassīti tīraṃ vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, taṃ na passati. Apāradassīti
atk-s0303a:374_1: pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ na passati. Baddhoti kilesabandhanena baddho hutvā jīyati
atk-s0303a:374_2: ca mīyati ca asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchatīti. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0303a:376_0: 122. Dasame aniccatotiādīsu hutvā abhāvākārena aniccato, paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhato,
atk-s0303a:376_1: ābādhaṭṭhena rogato, antodosaṭṭhena gaṇḍato, tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇḍānaṃ paccayabhāvena
atk-s0303a:376_2: vā khaṇanaṭṭhena vā sallato dukkhaṭṭhena aghato, visabhāgamahābhūtasamuṭṭhānaābādhapaccayaṭṭhena
atk-s0303a:376_3: ābādhato, asakaṭṭhena parato, palujjanaṭṭhena palokato, sattasuññataṭṭhena suññato,
atk-s0303a:376_4: attābhāvena anattato. Evamettha “aniccato palokato”ti dvīhi padehi aniccamanasikāro,
atk-s0303a:376_5: “suññato anattato”ti dvīhi anattamanasikāro, sesehi dukkhamanasikāro vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0303a:378: 123. Tathā ekādasame. Dasamasmiñhi “sīlavatā”ti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ vuttaṃ, idha sutavatāti kammaṭṭhānasutaṃ idameva nānākaraṇaṃ. Ekādasamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:384: 126-135. Avijjāvaggo uttānatthova. Imasmiñhi vagge sabbasuttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0303a:388_0: 136-149. Kukkuḷavaggassa paṭhame kukkuḷanti santattaṃ ādittaṃ chārikarāsiṃ viya mahāpariḷāhaṃ.
atk-s0303a:388_1: Imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu aniccalakkhaṇādīni. Sabbāni cetāni
atk-s0303a:392_0: 150-158. Diṭṭhivaggassa paṭhame kiṃ upādāyāti kiṃ paṭicca. Dutiye kiṃ abhinivissāti
atk-s0303a:392_1: kiṃ abhinivisitvā, paccayaṃ katvāti attho. Tatiyādīsu diṭṭhītiādīni puggalajjhāsayena
atk-s0303a:394_0: 159. Dasame upasaṅkamīti aññe bhikkhū pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjitvā
atk-s0303a:394_1: ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ patvā satthu santike aññaṃ byākaronte disvā “ahampi pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0303a:394_2: kathāpetvā yuñjanto ghaṭento, arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākarissāmī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0303a:394_3: Satthā pana attano dharamānakāle therassa uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ
atk-s0303a:394_4: apassantopi “imassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kathesi. Tassāpi ekaṃ dve vāre manasi katvāva
atk-s0303a:394_5: buddhupaṭṭhānavelā jātāti gantabbaṃ hoti. Itissa cittaṃ sampahaṃsamāno vimuttiparipācanīyadhammova
atk-s0303a:400_0: 160. Rādhasaṃyuttassa paṭhame māro vā assāti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyya. Māretā vāti māretabbo
atk-s0303a:400_1: vā. Yo vā pana mīyatīti yo vā pana marati. Nibbidatthanti nibbidāñāṇatthaṃ. Nibbānatthāti
atk-s0303a:400_2: phalavimutti nāmesā anupādānibbānatthāti attho. Accayāsīti atikkantosi. Nibbānogadhanti
atk-s0303a:400_3: nibbāne patiṭṭhitaṃ. Idaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ nāma nibbānabbhantare vussati, na nibbānaṃ
atk-s0303a:400_4: atikkamitvāti attho. Nibbānapariyosānanti nibbānaṃ assa pariyosānaṃ, nipphatti niṭṭhāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0303a:402_0: 161-169. Dutiye satto sattoti laggapucchā. Tatra satto tatra visattoti tatra laggo
atk-s0303a:402_1: tatra vilaggo. Paṃsvāgārakehīti paṃsugharakehi. Keḷāyantīti kīḷanti. Dhanāyantīti
atk-s0303a:402_2: dhanaṃ viya maññanti. Mamāyantīti “mama idaṃ, mama ida”nti mamattaṃ karonti, aññassa
atk-s0303a:402_3: phusitumpi na denti. Vikīḷaniyaṃ karontīti “niṭṭhitā kīḷā”ti te bhindamānā kīḷāvigamaṃ
atk-s0303a:402_4: karonti. Tatiye bhavanettīti bhavarajju. Catutthaṃ uttānameva. Pañcamādīsu catūsu
atk-s0303a:402_5: cattāri saccāni kathitāni, dvīsu kilesappahānanti. Dutiyādīni.
atk-s0303a:406_0: 170-181. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame māro, māroti maraṇaṃ pucchati. Yasmā pana rūpādivinimuttaṃ
atk-s0303a:406_1: maraṇaṃ nāma natthi, tenassa bhagavā rūpaṃ kho, rādha, mārotiādimāha. Dutiye māradhammoti
atk-s0303a:410_0: 182-205. Tato paraṃ uttānatthameva. Ayañhi rādhatthero paṭibhāniyatthero nāma. Tathāgatassa
atk-s0303a:410_1: imaṃ theraṃ disvā sukhumaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Tenassa bhagavā nānānayehi dhammaṃ
atk-s0303a:410_2: deseti. Evaṃ imasmiṃ rādhasaṃyutte ādito dve vaggā pucchāvasena desitā, tatiyo āyācanena,
atk-s0303a:410_3: catuttho upanisinnakakathāvasena. Sakalampi panetaṃ rādhasaṃyuttaṃ therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammavaseneva
atk-s0303a:414_0: 206. Diṭṭhisaṃyutte na vātā vāyantītiādīsu evaṃ kira tesaṃ diṭṭhi – “yepi ete rukkhasākhādīni
atk-s0303a:414_1: bhañjantā vātā vāyanti, na ete vātā, vātaleso nāmeso, vāto pana esikatthambho viya
atk-s0303a:414_2: pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito. Tathā yāpi etā tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vahantiyo nadiyo sandanti,
atk-s0303a:414_3: na ettha udakaṃ sandaki, udakaleso nāmesa, udakaṃ pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ
atk-s0303a:414_4: viya ca ṭhitaṃ. Yāpimā gabbhiniyo vijāyantīti ca vuccanti, kiñcāpi tā milātudarā
atk-s0303a:414_5: honti, gabbho pana na nikkhamati, gabbhaleso nāmeso, gabbho pana esikatthambho viya
atk-s0303a:414_6: pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito. Yepi ete candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā, neva te udenti
atk-s0303a:414_7: na apenti, candimasūriyaleso nāmesa, candimasūriyā pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0303a:416_0: 207-209. Diṭṭhantiādīsu diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ. Sutaṃ saddāyatanaṃ. Mutaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ
atk-s0303a:416_1: rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. Tañhi patvā gahetabbato mutanti ca vuttaṃ. Avasesāni
atk-s0303a:416_2: sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma. Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti
atk-s0303a:416_3: pattaṃ vā apattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. Anuvicaritaṃ manasāti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. Lokasmiñhi
atk-s0303a:416_4: pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, pariyesitvā nopattampi, apariyesitvā pattampi, apariyesitvā
atk-s0303a:416_5: nopattampi. Tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ pattaṃ nāma, pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ
atk-s0303a:416_6: nāma. Apariyesitvā pattañca apariyesitvā nopattañca manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. Atha
atk-s0303a:416_7: vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma, pariyesitvā
atk-s0303a:416_8: nopattameva pariyesitaṃ nāma, apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0303a:418_0: 210. Natthi dinnantiādīsu natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0303a:418_1: Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāyāgo. Hutanti paheṇakasakkāro adhippeto. Tampi ubhayaṃ phalābhāvameva
atk-s0303a:418_2: sandhāya paṭikkhipanti. Sukatadukkaṭānanti sukatadukkatānaṃ, kusalākusalānanti attho.
atk-s0303a:418_3: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati, taṃ natthīti vadanti. Natthi
atk-s0303a:418_4: ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi. Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi
atk-s0303a:418_5: paro loko natthi, sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantīti dassenti. Natthi mātā natthi
atk-s0303a:418_6: pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadanti. Natthi sattā
atk-s0303a:418_7: opapātikāti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadanti. Natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇāti
atk-s0303a:418_8: loke sammāpaṭipannā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:419_0: Cātumahābhūtikoti catumahābhūtamayo. Pathavī pathavīkāyanti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu
atk-s0303a:419_1: bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ. Anupetīti anuyāti. Anupagacchatīti tasseva vevacanaṃ, anugacchatītipi
atk-s0303a:419_2: attho. Ubhayenāpi upeti upagacchatīti dassenti. Āpādīsupi eseva nayo. Indriyānīti
atk-s0303a:419_3: manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni. Saṅkamantīti ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti. Āsandipañcamāti nipannamañcena
atk-s0303a:419_4: pañcamā, mañco ceva, cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho. Yāva
atk-s0303a:419_5: āḷāhanāti yāva susānā. Padānīti “ayaṃ evaṃ sīlavā ahosi, evaṃ dussīlo”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0303a:419_6: pavattāni guṇāguṇapadāni. Sarīrameva vā ettha padānīti adhippetaṃ. Kāpotakānīti kapotakavaṇṇāni,
atk-s0303a:419_7: pārāvatapakkhavaṇṇānīti attho. Bhassantāti bhasmantā. Ayameva vā pāḷi. Āhutiyoti
atk-s0303a:419_8: yaṃ paheṇakasakkārādibhedaṃ dinnadānaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ chārikāvasānameva hoti, na tato
atk-s0303a:419_9: paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho. Dattupaññattanti dattūhi bālamanussehi
atk-s0303a:419_10: paññattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bālehi abuddhīhi paññattamidaṃ dānaṃ, na paṇḍitehi.
atk-s0303a:421_0: 211. Karototi sahatthā karontassa. Kārayatoti āṇattiyā kārentassa. Chindatoti paresaṃ
atk-s0303a:421_1: hatthādīni chindantassa. Chedāpayatoti parehi chedāpentassa. Pacatoti daṇḍena pīḷentassa.
atk-s0303a:421_2: Pacāpayatoti parehi daṇḍādinā pīḷāpentassa. Socato socāpayatoti parassa bhaṇḍaharaṇādīhi
atk-s0303a:421_3: sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassāpi parehi kārentassāpi. Kilamato kilamāpayatoti āhārupacchedabandhanāgārapavesanādīhi
atk-s0303a:421_4: sayaṃ kilamentassapi parehi kilamāpentassapi. Phandato phandāpayatoti paraṃ phandantaṃ
atk-s0303a:421_5: phandanakāle sayampi phandato parempi phandāpayato. Pāṇamatipātayatoti pāṇaṃ hanantassapi
atk-s0303a:421_6: hanāpentassapi. Evaṃ sabbattha karaṇakārāpanavaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0303a:422_0: Sandhinti gharasandhiṃ. Nillopanti mahāvilopaṃ. Ekāgārikanti ekameva gharaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0303a:422_1: vilumpanaṃ. Paripanthe tiṭṭhatoti āgatāgatānaṃ acchindanatthaṃ magge tiṭṭhato. Karoto
atk-s0303a:422_2: na karīyati pāpanti yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati, natthi
atk-s0303a:422_3: pāpaṃ. Sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti dīpenti. Khurapariyantenāti khuraneminā,
atk-s0303a:422_4: khuradhārasadisapariyantena vā. Ekamaṃsakhalanti ekamaṃsarāsiṃ. Puñjanti tasseva
atk-s0303a:423_0: Dakkhiṇanti dakkhiṇatīre manussā kakkhaḷā dāruṇā, te sandhāya hanantotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0303a:423_1: Uttaranti uttaratīre saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0303a:423_2: te sandhāya dadantotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yajantoti mahāyāgaṃ karonto. Damenāti indriyadamena
atk-s0303a:423_3: uposathakammena. Saṃyamenāti sīlasaṃyamena. Saccavajjenāti saccavacanena. Āgamoti
atk-s0303a:423_4: āgamanaṃ, pavattīti attho. Sabbathāpi pāpapuññānaṃ kiriyameva paṭikkhipanti.
atk-s0303a:425_0: 212. Natthi hetu natthi paccayoti ettha paccayoti hetuvevacanameva. Ubhayenāpi vijjamānameva
atk-s0303a:425_2: Natthi balanti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā ime sattā devattampi mārattampi brahmattampi
atk-s0303a:425_3: sāvakabodhimpi paccekabodhimpi sabbaññutampi pāpuṇanti, taṃ balaṃ paṭikkhipanti.
atk-s0303a:425_4: Natthi vīriyantiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. “Idaṃ no vīriyena, idaṃ purisathāmena,
atk-s0303a:425_5: idaṃ purisaparakkamena patta”nti, evaṃ pavattavacanapaṭikkhepakaraṇavasena panetāni visuṃ ādiyanti.
atk-s0303a:426_0: Sabbe sattāti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādayo anavasese pariggaṇhanti. Sabbe pāṇāti ekindriyo
atk-s0303a:426_1: pāṇo, dvindriyo pāṇotiādivasena vadanti. Sabbe bhūtāti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte
atk-s0303a:426_2: sandhāya vadanti. Sabbe jīvāti sāliyavagodhumādayo sandhāya vadanti. Tesu hi te viruhanabhāvena
atk-s0303a:426_3: jīvasaññino. Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0303a:426_4: Niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti ettha niyatīti niyatatā. Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ
atk-s0303a:426_5: tattha tattha gamanaṃ. Bhāvoti sabhāvoyeva. Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena
atk-s0303a:426_6: ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā. Yena hi yathā bhavitabbaṃ, so tatheva bhavati.
atk-s0303a:426_7: Yena na bhavitabbaṃ, so na bhavatīti dassenti. Chasvevābhijātīsūti chasu eva abhijātīsu
atk-s0303a:426_8: ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti, aññā sukhadukkhabhūmi natthīti dassenti.
atk-s0303a:428_0: 213-215. Akaṭāti akatā. Akaṭavidhāti akatavidhānā, “evaṃ karohī”ti kenaci kāritāpi
atk-s0303a:428_1: na hontīti attho. Animmitāti iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. Animmātāti animmāpitā. “Animmitabbā”tipi
atk-s0303a:428_2: pāṭho, na nimmitabbāti attho. Vañjhāti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci
atk-s0303a:428_3: ajanakā. Pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ṭhitāti kūṭaṭṭhā. Esikaṭṭhāyino viya hutvā ṭhitāti esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0303a:428_4: yathā sunikhāto esikatthambho niccalo tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ṭhitāti attho. Na iñjantīti
atk-s0303a:428_5: esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti. Na vipariṇamantīti pakatiṃ na vijahanti.
atk-s0303a:428_6: Na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti. Nālanti na samatthā. Pathavīkāyotiādīsu
atk-s0303a:428_7: pathavīyeva pathavīkāyo, pathavīsamūho vā. Sattannaṃtveva kāyānanti yathā muggarāsiādīsu
atk-s0303a:428_8: pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antareneva pavisati, evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena
atk-s0303a:428_9: chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati. Tattha “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti kevalaṃ
atk-s0303a:429_1: ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni ca chasatāni pañca ca kammuno satānīti pañcakammasatāni cāti
atk-s0303a:429_2: kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpenti. Pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānītiādīsupi
atk-s0303a:429_3: eseva nayo. Keci panāhu “pañca kammānīti pañcindriyavasena gaṇhanti, tīṇīti kāyakammādivasenā”ti.
atk-s0303a:429_4: Kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cāti ettha panassa kāyakammavacīkammāni kammanti laddhi, manokammaṃ
atk-s0303a:429_6: ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti, ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.
atk-s0303a:430_0: Chaḷābhijātiyoti kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti
atk-s0303a:430_1: paramasukkābhijātīti imā cha abhijātiyo vadanti. Tattha orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā
atk-s0303a:430_2: māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā, ye vā panaññepi keci
atk-s0303a:430_3: kurūrakammantā, ayaṃ kaṇhābhijātīti vadanti. Bhikkhū nīlābhijātīti vadanti. Te kira
atk-s0303a:430_4: catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti, “bhikkhū ca kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti ayaṃ
atk-s0303a:430_5: hissa pāḷi eva. Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke pabbajitāti vadanti. Lohitābhijāti
atk-s0303a:430_6: nāma nigaṇṭhā ekasāṭakāti vadanti. Ime kira purimehi dvīhi paṇḍaratarā. Gihī odātavasanā
atk-s0303a:430_7: acelakasāvakā haliddābhijātīti vadanti. Evaṃ attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare
atk-s0303a:430_8: karonti. Ājīvakā ājīviniyo ayaṃ sukkābhijātīti vadanti. Te kira purimehi catūhi paṇḍaratarā.
atk-s0303a:430_9: Nando vaccho, kiso saṃkicco, makkhali gosālo paramasukkābhijātīti vadanti. Te kira
atk-s0303a:431_0: Aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekhabhūmi
atk-s0303a:431_1: samaṇabhūmi jānanabhūmi pannabhūmīti imā aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti vadanti. Tattha jātadivasato
atk-s0303a:431_2: paṭṭhāya satta divase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā, ayaṃ
atk-s0303a:431_3: mandabhūmīti vadanti. Ye pana duggatito āgatā honti, te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti
atk-s0303a:431_4: ca, sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti, ayaṃ khiḍḍābhūmi nāma. Mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0303a:431_5: hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi
atk-s0303a:431_6: nāma. Padasā gantuṃ samatthakālo ujugatabhūmi nāma. Sippāni sikkhanakālo sekhabhūmi
atk-s0303a:431_7: nāma. Gharā nikkhamma pabbajanakālo samaṇabhūmi nāma. Ācariyaṃ sevitvā jānanakālo
atk-s0303a:431_8: jānanabhūmi nāma. “Bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhā”ti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.
atk-s0303a:432_0: Ekūnapaññāsa ājīvakasateti ekūnapaññāsa ājīvavuttisatāni. Paribbājakasateti paribbājakapabbajjāsatāni.
atk-s0303a:432_1: Nāgavāsasateti nāgamaṇḍalasatāni. Vīse indriyasateti vīsa indriyasatāni. Tiṃse nirayasateti
atk-s0303a:432_3: sandhāya vadati. Satta saññīgabbhāti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhaajapasumigamahiṃse sandhāya
atk-s0303a:432_4: vadati. Satta asaññīgabbhāti sāliyavagodhumamuggakaṅguvarakakudrūsake sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0303a:432_5: Nigaṇṭhigabbhāti gaṇṭhimhi jātagabbhā, ucchuveḷunaḷādayo sandhāya vadati. Satta devāti
atk-s0303a:432_6: bahū devā, so pana sattāti vadati. Manussāpi anantā, so sattāti vadati. Satta pesācāti
atk-s0303a:432_7: pisācā mahantamahantā, sattāti vadati. Sarāti mahāsarā. Kaṇṇamuṇḍa-rathakāra-anotatta-sīhappapāta-chaddanta-mucalinda-kuṇāladahe gahetvā vadati.
